sentence.Network_en: When baked with sausages ( within the batter ), it is known as toad in the hole.
sentence.Network_cn: 搭配香肠一起吃的时候, 它又被形象地称为洞中的蟾蜍.

sentence.Network_en: Sausages are commonly eaten, either as bangers and mash or toad in the hole.
sentence.Network_cn: 香肠是很常见的食物, 肠中常常是肉泥或桂花肉.

sentence.Network_en: Our superior technology is our ace in the hole.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们超众的技术是我们的法宝。

找一天，跟他在食堂吃一顿面糊烤香肠(toad-in-the-hole)，试着和颜悦色地跟他谈谈这个问题。如果他听从你的建议，就向他表示祝贺。
